alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 4:26PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LAPEER...MACOMB...AND ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile and produce snow rate around 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 423 PM EST, the area of heavy snow extended along and north of a line from near Brown City to Lum to near Columbiaville and moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Imlay City around 440 PM EST. Lapeer and Yale around 510 PM EST. Capac around 515 PM EST. Metamora and Emmett around 535 PM EST. Dryden around 605 PM EST. Memphis around 615 PM EST. Richmond around 625 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-94 between mile markers 247 and 273. I-69 between mile markers 149 and 199. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
